snippet: People planning decades of retirement based on $1 million in savings need to recognize that that amount is not nearly as valuable as it once was, experts say.
abstract: Experts advise that $1 million in savings is not nearly as valuable as it once was, a fact that people planning decades of retirement should take into consideration; some planners advise people to buy annuities--and to spend wisely.
lead_paragraph: People planning decades of retirement based on $1 million in savings need to recognize that that amount is not nearly as valuable as it once was, experts say.

headline.seo: How to Make a (Measly) $1 Million Retirement Nest Egg Last
